title: Hi!
text: I am a web designer / developer. I am from a town called 'Cat-Man-Do' [Kathmandu]. Nowadays I am based in London, UK. Desiging is my passion. I enjoying designing and developing websites.

title: I can Design the way you like
text: My goal would be focusing on content, suitable font-type, colour combination, Images and conveying the message that you would like to send. I prefer a clean design. This is just my personal preference. I believe on design is a personal matter. I will design the way you like.

title: I can develop what you need
text: I am a developer. I can develop a website that meets your requirement. I use current trends and technology. That fits in all type of devices.

title: Status
text: I am currently available for freelance work. If you have a project that you want to get started. Please get in touch.
